item.title: Welcome
item.description: Â  This is our first post at SYS and we hope there will be more to come. The basic idea of this site is to allow anyone to share their story and to let everyone know of their hardship and silent suffering. Pain is all around us all the time, but it is not so easily distinguished and noticed. We want to let the world know about how even the happiest person could be the saddest and that they may need some help. So come join us on this journey.
